title: The Lazarus Effect
description: The exciting sequel to The Jesus Incident, one of the greatest adventures since Dune.A world of waterIn The Jesus Incident, Frank Herbert and Bill Ransom introduced Ship, an artificial intelligence that believed it was God, abandoning its unworthy human cargo on the all-sea world of Pandora. Now centuries have passed. The descendants of humanity, split into Mermen and Islanders, must reunite because Pandora's original owner is returning to life.
author: Frank Herbert
